title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 561.12 - Operating reserves
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 561.12 - Operating reserves

State Regulations

Accretions to operating reserve accounts made by charges
to operating expenses shall not exceed a reasonable provision for the expense. Material balances in such reserve accounts shall not be diverted from the
purpose for which provided unless the permission of the commission is first
obtained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
561.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
